name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Java** and **JVM** technologies, along with a strong foundation in **concurrency**, **distributed systems**, and **performance engineering**. Proven ability to enhance application performance through advanced techniques in **garbage collection**, **JIT compilation**, and **memory layout** optimization. Skilled in ensuring application efficiency with knowledge of **parallelism**, **storage internals**, **caching**, and **indexing** to improve I/O behavior.

Experienced in utilizing **Hazelcast** for distributed caching and application management, and proficient in leveraging observability tools such as **JFR** and **async-profiler** to gain insights into performance issues. Committed to contributing to open-source projects, enhancing overall knowledge and community engagement. Additionally, adept in developing high-performance, compliant applications in healthcare and finance using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while also building AI/ML-powered platforms that focus on predictive analytics and real-time processing.
